page.title: 07HOUSES IN PEBMARSH AREA
page.content: The houses in our area are of different types.The houses date from the 15th century to the present time.The oldest houses are Hunt's Hall,World's End and Spoon's Hall.The most modern house was completed in 1985. Most houses in the area are{detached} but there are still many{ {semi-detached.}Most of the semi-detached houses are to be found at{Clay Hills,Cross End}and{Mill Lane. Most of the{Council Houses} were built in the 1930's.Many of the Council Houses have been bought by their tenants. The bungalows in Mill Lane were built in 1978. Most of the very old houses are{Farm {Houses}but the old Manor House is now the Post Office and a dwelling. There are 14{thatched houses}in the area.
